definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
(dialect) prostitute from Guangdong (esp. one in Shanghai before the Revolution) (loanword from "handsome maid")

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is the largest inland saltwater lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中国最大的内陆咸水湖。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava.
sentences.chinese: 蓝泻湖是一个由火山熔岩形成的咸水湖，富含矿物质。

sentences.english: Fly fishing and saltwater fishing are your choices depending on the time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 渔业及咸水鱼飞取决于你选择了一年时间。

sentences.english: An osmotic agent is added to the composition for use in attracting salt-water aquatic animals.
sentences.chinese: 一种渗透性的试剂添加到其中用来吸引咸水水生动物。

sentences.english: The dialysis principle can be used for demineralization of brackish water .
sentences.chinese: 渗析原理的应用是除半咸水中的盐。

sentences.english: This paper discusses desalination techniques of carbon nanotube electrodes by electric adsorption.
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳纳米管电极电吸附苦咸水脱盐。

sentences.english: Sunny Bay Salt Water Pumping Station under construction.
sentences.chinese: 兴建中的欣澳咸水抽水站。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava2.
sentences.chinese: 蓝泻湖是一个由火山熔岩形成的咸水湖，富含矿物质。

sentences.english: So then we went to the Blue Lagoon .
sentences.chinese: 所以我们去了蓝色咸水湖。

sentences.english: But I've already bought a saltwater fly rod.
sentences.chinese: 但我已经买了咸水湖鱼鳔。

sentences.english: The salt-water fish we usually eat are Grouper, Golden thread and Pomfret.
sentences.chinese: 我们经常吃的咸水鱼有石斑鱼，红衫鱼和仓鱼。

sentences.english: Desalination by dewvaporation process is a novel brackish and seawater desalination method.
sentences.chinese: 露点蒸发淡化技术是一种新的苦咸水和海水淡化方法。

sentences.english: The bacterium can also live in the environment in brackish rivers and coastal waters.
sentences.chinese: 这种杆菌还可在咸水河流和海岸水域的环境中生存。

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is China's largest lagoonal.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中国最大的咸水湖。

sentences.english: Oil source rock is the dark mudstone in Es1 Member, which deposited in a saline environment.
sentences.chinese: 油源为本地咸水环境下形成的沙一段暗色泥岩。

sentences.english: Gars are confined chiefly to fresh water, though some species enter brackish or salt water.
sentences.chinese: 主要栖于淡水，但有的种可降入半咸水甚至咸水。

definition: potable water (water with low salt content)/fresh water
Danshui or Tanshui town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
lagoon/erroneously written 瀉湖|泻湖[xie4 hu2]
